name: Garbage Boat
description:
A fun and cute interactive app for Kids!

Its garbage collection on the high seas!
This is the first of our fantasy vehicle series combining two super fun things together, garbage trucks and boats!
Ride along on a garbage boat on garbage day as it floats through a coastal neighborhood. Help the garbage man pick up the garbage cans. A real treat for those little garbage truck enthusiasts and a great way to encourage curiosity and interaction for all. Touch the driver and he honks the horn. Touch a cloud as it passes by and it smiles and hums. Touch the fish and they jump and splash! The neighborhood is interactive. When your child touches people, animals, or objects they make sounds and perform actions. Its like a moving story book!

A great way to explore the sights and sounds of a Garbage Boat.

*Compatible with: iPod Touch 3 & 4 generation, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 & all iPads.

-----------------------------------------------

*Note: NOT Compatible with: First generation iPhone, iPhone 3G, and iPod Touch 1st & 2nd generation.

-----------------------------------------------
